00091   Poller(int reserve=8)
00092       : pollitems_(NULL),
00093         pollitems_size_(0),
00094         idx_to_pos_(NULL),
00095         pos_to_idx_(NULL),
00096         used_count_(0),
00097         event_count_(0),
00098         interrupted_(false) {
00099     if (reserve < 0) reserve = 10;
00100     pollitems_ = (zmq_pollitem_t*)calloc(reserve, sizeof(zmq_pollitem_t));
00101     if (pollitems_ == NULL) {
00102       throw Exception("Could not pre-allocate %i pollitems", reserve);
00103     }
00104 
00105     idx_to_pos_ = (int*)calloc(reserve, sizeof(int));
00106     if (idx_to_pos_ == NULL) {
00107       free(pollitems_);
00108       throw Exception("Could not pre-allocate %i pollitems", reserve);
00109     }
00110 
00111     pos_to_idx_ = (int*)calloc(reserve, sizeof(int));
00112     if (pos_to_idx_ == NULL) {
00113       free(pollitems_);
00114       free(idx_to_pos_);
00115       throw Exception("Could not pre-allocate %i pollitems", reserve);
00116     }
00117     pollitems_size_ = reserve;
00118 
00119     memset(idx_to_pos_, -1, reserve * sizeof(int));
00120     memset(pos_to_idx_, -1, reserve * sizeof(int));
00121 
00122     setupInterruptHook();
00123   }

00138   bool poll(float timeout) {
00139     // interruption can occur between poll operations
00140     if (interrupted_) return false;
00141     // printf("============================= %f\n", timeout);
00142     // for(int i=0; i<used_count_; ++i) {
00143     //   zmq_pollitem_t *item = pollitems_ + i;
00144     //   printf("%i: %2i / %p (%i)\n", i, item->fd, item->socket, item->events);
00145     // }
00146 #if POLLER_JITTER_HACK
00147     if (timeout > 0) {
00148       double start = time_.elapsed();
00149       long t = timeout > 2 ? timeout - 2 : timeout;
00150       // zmq counts micro seconds
00151       event_count_ = zmq_poll(pollitems_, used_count_, t * 1000);
00152       if (event_count_ < 0) {
00153         // error or interruption
00154         event_count_ = 0;
00155         if (!interrupted_) {
00156           throw Exception("An error occured during zmq_poll (%s)", zmq_strerror(zmq_errno()));
00157         } else {
00158           return false;
00159         }
00160       } else if (!event_count_) {
00161         // timed out
00162         double remaining = timeout - time_.elapsed() + start;
00163         // TODO: We must measure that this 'hack' improves jitter.
00164         if (remaining > 0) Thread::millisleep(remaining);
00165       }
00166     } else {
00167       // no timeout or 0
00168       event_count_ = zmq_poll(pollitems_, used_count_, timeout);
00169       if (event_count_ < 0) {
00170         // error or interruption
00171         event_count_ = 0;
00172         if (!interrupted_) {
00173           throw Exception("An error occured during zmq_poll (%s)", zmq_strerror(zmq_errno()));
00174         } else {
00175           return false;
00176         }
00177       }
00178     }
00179 #else
00180     event_count_ = zmq_poll(pollitems_, used_count_, timeout * 1000);
00181     // printf("===> %i\n", event_count_);
00182     if (event_count_ < 0) {
00183       // error or interruption
00184       event_count_ = 0;
00185       if (!interrupted_) {
00186         throw Exception("An error occured during zmq_poll (%s)", zmq_strerror(zmq_errno()));
00187       } else {
00188         return false;
00189       }
00190     }
00191 #endif
00192     return true;
00193   }

00197   LuaStackSize events(lua_State *L) {
00198     if (!event_count_) return 0;
00199     lua_newtable(L);
00200     // <table>
00201     int pos = 0;
00202     for(int i=0; i < used_count_; ++i) {
00203       zmq_pollitem_t *item = pollitems_ + i;
00204       if (item->revents) {
00205         lua_pushnumber(L, pos_to_idx_[i]);
00206         // <table> <idx>
00207         lua_rawseti(L, -2, ++pos);
00208       }
00209       if (pos == event_count_) break;
00210     }
00211     event_count_ = 0;
00212     return 1;
00213   }

00225   void modify(int idx, int events, lua_State *L) {
00226     assert(events);
00227     assert(idx < pollitems_size_ && idx >= 0);
00228     zmq_pollitem_t *item = pollitems_ + idx_to_pos_[idx];
00229     item->events = events;
00230     int top = lua_gettop(L);
00231     // <self> <idx> <events> <new_fd>
00232     if (top > 3) {
00233       if (lua_isuserdata(L, 4)) {
00234         zmq::Socket *sock = *((zmq::Socket **)dubL_checksdata(L, 4, "zmq.Socket"));
00235         item->fd = 0;
00236         item->socket = sock->socket_;
00237       } else {
00238         int fd = dubL_checkint(L, 4);
00239         item->fd = fd;
00240         item->socket = NULL;
00241       }
00242     }
00243   }

00247   void remove(int idx) {
00248     assert(idx < pollitems_size_ && idx >= 0);
00249     int last_pos = used_count_ - 1;
00250     int pos = idx_to_pos_[idx];
00251     idx_to_pos_[idx] = -1; // now free
00252     --used_count_;
00253     if (pos == last_pos) {
00254       // we removed the last element, we are done.
00255       return;
00256     }
00257     // move last item in the position where idx was
00258     int last_idx = pos_to_idx_[last_pos];
00259     pos_to_idx_[last_pos] = -1;
00260     idx_to_pos_[last_idx] = pos;
00261     pos_to_idx_[pos] = last_idx;
00262     // pollitems_[pos] <== pollitems_[last_pos];
00263     memcpy(pollitems_ + pos, pollitems_ + last_pos, sizeof(zmq_pollitem_t));
00264   }

00307   static pthread_key_t sThisKey;
00308 private:
00309   int addItem(int fd, void *socket, int events) {
00310     // printf("addItem fd:%i socket:%p\n", fd, socket);
00311     if (used_count_ >= pollitems_size_) {
00312       // we need more space: realloc
00313       int *sptr = (int*)realloc(idx_to_pos_, pollitems_size_ * 2 * sizeof(int));
00314       if (!sptr) {
00315         throw Exception("Could not reallocate %i pollitems.", pollitems_size_ * 2);
00316       }
00317       idx_to_pos_ = sptr;
00318       sptr = NULL;
00319       sptr = (int*)realloc(pos_to_idx_, pollitems_size_ * 2 * sizeof(int));
00320       if (!sptr) {
00321         throw Exception("Could not reallocate %i pollitems.", pollitems_size_ * 2);
00322       }
00323       pos_to_idx_ = sptr;
00324       zmq_pollitem_t *ptr = (zmq_pollitem_t*)realloc(pollitems_, pollitems_size_ * 2 * sizeof(zmq_pollitem_t));
00325       if (!ptr) {
00326         throw Exception("Could not reallocate %i pollitems.", pollitems_size_ * 2);
00327       }
00328       pollitems_ = ptr;
00329       // clear new space (same size as pollitems_size_ because we double).
00330       memset(idx_to_pos_+ used_count_, -1, pollitems_size_ * sizeof(int));
00331       memset(pos_to_idx_+ used_count_, -1, pollitems_size_ * sizeof(int));
00332       memset(pollitems_ + used_count_,  0, pollitems_size_ * sizeof(zmq_pollitem_t));
00333       pollitems_size_ = 2 * pollitems_size_;
00334     }
00335     int pos = used_count_;
00336     ++used_count_;
00337     zmq_pollitem_t *item = pollitems_ + pos;
00338     item->fd = fd;
00339     item->socket = socket;
00340     item->events = events;
00341     // Hasn't been moved yet: idx == position
00342     // find a free idx
00343     int idx;
00344     for(idx = 0; idx < pollitems_size_; ++idx) {
00345       if (idx_to_pos_[idx] < 0) break;
00346     }
00347     idx_to_pos_[idx] = pos;
00348     pos_to_idx_[pos] = idx;
00349 
00350     return idx;
00351   }

00353   static void sInterrupted(int i) {
00354     signal(i, SIG_DFL); // double interrupt == kill
00355     Poller *p = (Poller*)pthread_getspecific(sThisKey);
00356     p->interrupted_ = true;
00357     // continue
00358   }
00359 
00360   void setupInterruptHook() {
00361     Poller *p = (Poller*)pthread_getspecific(sThisKey);
00362     if (!p) {
00363       // only register first (main) Scheduler
00364       pthread_setspecific(sThisKey, (void*)this);
00365       signal(SIGINT, sInterrupted);
00366     }
00367   }
